com.paypal.merchant.sdk.domain.shopping

Interface Discount


  • public interface Discount
    A Discount to apply for a purchase.

    Tracks the value and type of the discount. The type can be a PercentOff or a TotalOff.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Discount.Type
      The types of discounts that can be applied.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(Discount otherDiscount)
      Returns true if this Discount has the same type & value as the provided discount.

      Fetch the type of the discount.

      Fetch the value of the discount as a string.

      Set the type of the discount.
      void setValue(java.math.BigDecimal value)
      Set the value of the discount.

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        java.math.BigDecimal getValue()
        Fetch the value of the discount as a string.
        Returns:
        A String containing the discount.

      • setValue

        void setValue(java.math.BigDecimal value)
        Set the value of the discount. If this is a 'TotalOff' Type of discount then this is the amount in the currency. If this is a 'PercentOff' Type of discount then this is the percentage. For example, passing in a new BigDecimal("10.00") would mean a discount of 10 percent.
        Parameters:
        value - A String containing the discount.

      • getType

        Discount.Type getType()
        Fetch the type of the discount.
        Returns:
        A Discount.Type value (PercentOff or TotalOff)

      • setType

        void setType(Discount.Type type)
        Set the type of the discount.
        Parameters:
        type - A Discount.Type value.

      • equals

        boolean equals(Discount otherDiscount)
        Returns true if this Discount has the same type & value as the provided discount.
        Parameters:
        otherDiscount - A Discount object to compare ourselves to.
        Returns:
